overview_of_class: Overview of modern particle physics and experimental techniques.  Interactions and fundamental symmetries. Strong interactions: the quark model and quantum chromodynamics. Weak interactions: neutrinos,parity and CP violation. Electroweak unification.
name: Particle Physics
title: WCAS PHYSICS 424-1-1 Particle Physics

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute (2145 Sheridan Road), Room F-123, Evanston

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Overview of modern particle physics and experimental techniques. Interactions and fundamental symmetries. Strong interactions: the quark model and quantum chromodynamics. Weak interactions: neutrinos,parity and CP violation. Electroweak unification.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Phyx 412-1,2,3 (quantum mechanics), or permission of the instructor

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
"Elementary Particle Physics" by Alessandro Bettini (Cambridge publishers)

"Introduction to Elementary Particles" by David Griffiths (Wiley publishers)

Introduction to High Energy Physics by D.H. Perkins, 4th Edition (Cambridge University Press)

subject: PHYSICS
